text: kamaghɨn men azai, “Ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi? Jerubalɨn otarir 70pla e gativagh, en faragh mangam, o? Ia ti gumazir vamɨrara ateghtɨ a en gumazir dapanimɨn ikiam? Ia deraghvɨra nɨghnɨgh, kɨ Abimelek, kɨ ian inivafɨzimra. Ia bizir kam deraghvɨra an gun mɨkɨmtɨ, Sekemɨn gumazir aruaba ian nɨghnɨzim baragham.”
